We had a wonderful stay at the Stargazer and HIGHLY recommend this gorgeous home. Tom and Cindy are spectacular hosts and really thought of everything to ensure their guests have a great trip. Their home is beautiful, extremely clean, and well organized. There were extra single packs of toothbrushes and other toiletries, canned sodas and drinks in the fridge, as well as a thorough guidebook with information about the house. We even got in late after driving 12 hours from Virginia the first night and Tom left the porch light on for us!

This house is great for singles and families alike with an ample backyard, games, and a telescope for those who really want to stargaze. It’s conveniently close to several restaurants and fast food as well as a large Walmart but is still tucked away in the beautiful hillside. We’ve traveled down here to visit family several times and generally stay in airbnbs and this has been one of our favorites. Thanks so much Tom and Cindy!
